In this vignette, you'll learn how to use `psborrow2` to create a
simulation study which will help inform trial design. Let's start by
loading `psborrow2`:

```{r setup}
library(psborrow2)
```


## Simulate covariates

We will then start by specifying the sample size for internal control,
external control, and internal treatment arms to be 200, 400, and 180,
respectively, using the function `sim_samplesize()`.

```{r}
ss <- sim_samplesize(
  n_internal_control = 200,
  n_external_control = 400,
  n_internal_experimental = 180
)
```
